vans.name: Modest Explorer
vans.description: The Modest Explorer is a van designed to get you out of the house and into nature. This beauty is equipped with solar panels, a composting toilet, a water tank and kitchenette. The idea is that you can pack up your home and escape for a weekend or even longer!

vans.name: Beach Bum
vans.description: Beach Bum is a van inspired by surfers and travelers. It was created to be a portable home away from home, but with some cool features in it you won't find in an ordinary camper.

vans.name: Reliable Red
vans.description: Reliable Red is a van that was made for travelling. The inside is comfortable and cozy, with plenty of space to stretch out in. There's a small kitchen, so you can cook if you need to. You'll feel like home as soon as you step out of it.

vans.name: Dreamfinder
vans.description: Dreamfinder is the perfect van to travel in and experience. With a ceiling height of 2.1m, you can stand up in this van and there is great head room. The floor is a beautiful glass-reinforced plastic (GRP) which is easy to clean and very hard wearing. A large rear window and large side windows make it really light inside and keep it well ventilated   .

vans.name: The Cruiser
vans.description: The Cruiser is a van for those who love to travel in comfort and luxury. With its many windows, spacious interior and ample storage space, the Cruiser offers a beautiful view wherever you go.

vans.name: Green Wonder
vans.description: With this van, you can take your travel life to the next level. The Green Wonder is a sustainable vehicle that's perfect for people who are looking for a stylish, eco-friendly mode of transport that can go anywhere.

customerRating.name: Elliot
customerRating.text: The beach bum is such as awesome van! Such as comfortable trip. We had it for 2 weeks and there was not a single issue. Super clean when we picked it up and the host is very comfortable and understanding. Highly recommend!

customerRating.name: Sandy
customerRating.text: This is our third time using the Modest Explorer for our travels and we love it! No complaints, absolutely perfect!
